name: Journey Beyond the Edge of the World
storyline: A world confined to a fishing ship, lost at sea — with a twist, because multiple timelines are accessible through portals, giving access to previously locked-off areas, items, story fragments. Over the course of the game, you explore more and more of the constantly changing and evolving MS Constance and find out what happened to the ship and to its crew.
summary: An atmospheric first-person adventure game set on a storm-torn fishing ship. Solve puzzles to unfold a mysterious and surreal story – told in a unique way through narrated ambient music. An audiovisual experience with pixelated graphics and immersive spatial audio that works on regular headphones.
